content.title: A Big OX Thank You! We Hit Our Goal in 5 Hours. All SPEEDFRAME®’s Will Be 100% Backed.
content.creator:
OX Tools
February 7, 2025
content.content:
We are absolutely thrilled to announce that thanks to your incredible support, we’ve hit our funding goal in just 5 hours! This is a monumental achievement and it’s all because of you - our dedicated community who believes in revolutionizing precision with SPEEDFRAME®.
What’s Next?
Every SPEEDFRAME® is now 100% backed, ensuring that we can move forward with getting each reward into your hands as soon as possible. We’re committed to maintaining transparency and will keep you updated every step of the way. As of today, we're still on pace to meet our original production timeline shown below:

We can’t express enough how grateful we are for your trust and support. Stay tuned for more updates as we progress!
- The OX Tools Innovation Team
